example.english: We only have one single cookie left? Who ate them all?
example.spanish: ¿Nos queda una sola galleta? ¿Quién se las comió?

example.english: We need to make a single payment.
example.spanish: Tenemos que hacer un pago único.

example.english: He's married to a famous singer.
example.spanish: Él está casado con una cantante famosa.

example.english: She's married to a soccer player.
example.spanish: Ella está casada con un futbolista.

example.english: The students rearranged the desks into the shape of a square.
example.spanish: Los estudiantes reorganizaron los escritorios en forma de cuadrado.

example.english: Use the squares on the paper to help you to line up the equation.
example.spanish: Utiliza los cuadros del papel para ayudarte a alinear la ecuación.

example.english: He has a round face and big eyes.
example.spanish: Tiene la cara redonda con ojos grandes.

example.english: Some say if the belly is big and round it means that the mother is carrying a girl.
example.spanish: Algunos dicen que si la barriga es grande y redonda, significa que la madre está esperando una niña.

example.english: He's so strong that he can lift both of his children at the same time.
example.spanish: Es tan fuerte que puede levantar a sus dos hijos a la vez.

example.english: She had very strong teeth.
example.spanish: Tenía los dientes muy sanos.

example.english: The old man was too weak to open the door on his own.
example.spanish: El anciano era demasiado débil para abrir la puerta por su cuenta.

example.english: This coffee is weak! It tastes like water.
example.spanish: ¡Este café está flojo! Sabe a agua.

example.english: Both of my parents are tall, but I'm short.
example.spanish: Mis padres son los dos altos pero yo soy bajo.

example.english: how tall are you?
example.spanish: ¿cuánto mides?

example.english: I think these pants are too short.
example.spanish: Creo que este pantalón es demasiado corto.

example.english: He was short for his age.
example.spanish: Era bajo para su edad.

example.english: My daughter's room is never tidy.
example.spanish: El cuarto de mi hija nunca está ordenado.

example.english: I like to keep the house clean and tidy.
example.spanish: Me gusta tener la casa limpia y arreglada.

example.english: This room is so untidy; it's a wonder you can ever find anything.
example.spanish: Este cuarto está tan desordenado que es un milagro que encuentres algo.

example.english: He was regularly punished for his untidy schoolwork.
example.spanish: Lo castigaban con frecuencia por lo descuidadas que estaban sus tareas.

example.english: Is it true that they plan to build a road through the swamp?
example.spanish: ¿Es cierto que planean construir un camino por el pantano?

example.english: I don't think that's the true result.
example.spanish: No creo que ese sea el resultado verdadero.

example.english: His life was ruined by false accusations.
example.spanish: Su vida quedó arruinada como resultado de falsas acusaciones.

example.english: He clings to his false beliefs despite all evidence to the contrary.
example.spanish: Se aferra a sus creencias equivocadas a pesar de todas las pruebas en contrario.

example.english: Carlos prepared a useful infographic for the board meeting.
example.spanish: Carlos preparó un infográfico útil para la reunión de la junta.

example.english: Her prior experience was very useful in her new job.
example.spanish: Su experiencia previa le fue muy provechosa en su nuevo trabajo.

example.english: No, I don't want to order a bookshelf without shelves; it's useless.
example.spanish: No, no quiero comprar un librero sin estantes; es inútil.

example.english: The scissors fell to the floor and became useless.
example.spanish: Las tijeras cayeron al suelo y quedaron inservibles.

example.english: The grass is all wet.
example.spanish: El pasto está todo mojado.

example.english: The horses' coats were wet from the dew in the air.
example.spanish: Los caballos tenían el pelaje mojado por el rocío del aire.

example.english: The clothes are dry and ready to be folded.
example.spanish: La ropa está seca y lista para doblar.

example.english: The desert is very dry, making any sort of agriculture difficult.
example.spanish: El desierto es muy árido, por lo que es difícil cualquier tipo de agricultura.

example.english: Angelica's house is on a wide street.
example.spanish: La casa de Angélica se encuentra en una calle ancha.

example.english: The lot measures 20 meters wide.
example.spanish: El terreno mide 20 metros de ancho.

example.english: This road is very narrow.
example.spanish: Esta carretera es muy estrecha.

example.english: Do we have to go down this narrow street?
example.spanish: ¿Tenemos que pasar por esta calle angosta?
